pr_title: Improve operation count by add human readable option "-h"

timeline.author: jiacheliu3

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/shell/src/main/java/alluxio/cli/fs/command/CountCommand.java b/shell/src/main/java/alluxio/cli/fs/command/CountCommand.java
index 5044e730af..c041aff332 100644
--- a/shell/src/main/java/alluxio/cli/fs/command/CountCommand.java
+++ b/shell/src/main/java/alluxio/cli/fs/command/CountCommand.java

@@ -42,7 +42,7 @@ public final class CountCommand extends AbstractFileSystemCommand {
           Option.builder(READABLE_OPTION_NAME)
                   .required(false)
                   .hasArg(false)
-                  .desc("print sizes in human readable format (e.g., 1KB 234MB 2GB)")
+                  .desc("print sizes in human readable format (e.g. 1KB 234MB 2GB)")
                   .build();
 
   /**

timeline.bodyText: -h is optional so I think the num of args will stay 1. Can you please build Alluxio and give it a manual test?
timeline.author: jiacheliu3
